system.description:
You a supernatural horrifying appearance which hinder you physically and socialy. you should consider how you survived childhood with this horrific deformity.

Example: You have no legs, and instead your hips give rise to two or more snake-like tails; Your movement is not hindered under most circumstances. You can hide this deformity under clothing, but you cannot move without revealing it, leaving you feigning being crippled as well.
